did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, publications, memos, and subject files concerning his work at The New School in the Bernard Schwartz Center for Economic Policy Analysis and with the Union for Radical Political Economics (URPE).

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor of Economics at The New School for Social Research.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, publications, memos, and subject files concerning his work at The New School in the Bernard Schwartz Center for Economic Policy Analysis and with the Union for Radical Political Economics (URPE).

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New School University.Center for Economic Policy Analysis.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: David Gordon papers, #6683. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
